short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your personal companion that offers smart analysis of your LinkedIn profiles & creates custom media kits

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your go-to tool to gain deep insights into your LinkedIn profile, determine the right price for brand collaborations, and create custom media kits—all in one place
The LinkedIn Profile Pro by anchors is a tool that makes managing your LinkedIn profile super easy, whether you're looking to understand your audience better, improve your engagement rates, know what you should charge for sponsored content or share your stats in an elegant way.

Who is it for?
IT IS BUILT FOR ANYONE WHO ACTIVELY POSTS ON LINKEDIN:
● New & aspiring content creators who want to grow their presence and improve their performance on LinkedIn
●  Experienced & thriving content creators who are busy and want one tool to stay on top of things in an easy manner
●  Professionals/founders looking to build a personal brand and who want to understand and optimize their LinkedIn profile

This is a MUST for LinkedIn creators, professionals and founders. And so we have kept it 100% FREE!

KEY FEATURES:
► Easy Media Kit Creation: Quickly create custom media kits with your LinkedIn data, like followers, audience demographics, and engagement rates. It’s perfect for showing off your entire profile at a glance to potential partners.

► Pricing Calculator: Find out how much to charge for your sponsored posts. This tool analyzes your profile metrics to suggest a fair compensation to you, based on your niche followers, and many such factors, along with what others in your field charge.

► Profile and Post Analysis: Learn how well your posts are doing and WHY. Understand audience engagement patterns, which posts are working and which posts are not. And also get tips on how to make them better.

► Sentiment Analysis: See how people feel about your posts and the emotional impact your posts have made. This helps you adjust your content strategy to better align with audience perceptions, so that your followers will enjoy and engage with your content more often.


HOW IT WORKS: 
- Install the Extension by clicking the “Add to Chrome" button
- Pin the extension to your toolbar
- Login to your LinkedIn profile
- Start using the tools by clicking on the extension

You’ll see how easy it is to make your profile better, check your overall performance, and determine the right prices for your work.
